items.name: func destination() -> PDFDestination!
items.desc: Gets the destination for the link when the destination was specified as a PDFDestination object.

items.name: func setDestination(PDFDestination!)
items.desc: Sets the destination for the link as a PDFDestination object.

items.name: func url() -> URL!
items.desc: Gets the destination for the link when the destination was specified as a URL.

items.name: func setURL(URL!)
items.desc: Sets the destination for the link as a URL.
